Gotoku Kanna means plane with 5 uses. As smoothing (not final), both sides of rabbet, and both side rabbets.
The vFunahiro Genmyo Smoothing plane is typically the first bench plane to touch rough lumber. This is the No. 5-1/2 version, which is slightly larger and heavier than the No.
This blade is a direct replacement for the one included with your Bench Tools No. Having a spare iron on hand ensures you'll always have a sharp edge to deal with challenging grain.
Let us start the list with one of the basic tools in the world of woodworking: the Chisel. It is a sharp angled piece of steel with a handle for carving or cutting wood.
Even with the wide availability of machine saws, a hand saw is a very useful tool for cutting wood. You can quickly take a hand saw and make the necessary cuts rather than setting up a table saw
The first and an essential hand-held power tool that is a must in every woodworking shop is a power drill. They are used to make holes in wood, metal, walls, etc.
While a hand saw is useful for quick and small jobs, a decent Circular Saw can be very helpful. You can cut a variety of materials such as wood, metal and many more with precise and clean cuts.
